content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Complex at position(x=37-41, y=-85 to -87)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill (x=37.0, y=-85.0) with chest at (x=36.5, y=-86.5)
- Burner mining drill (x=39.0, y=-85.0) with chest at (x=39.5, y=-83.5)
- Burner mining drill (x=41.0, y=-86.0) with chest at (x=40.5, y=-87.5)
- Burner mining drill (x=41.0, y=-83.0) with chest at (x=40.5, y=-84.5)
- Burner inserters connecting the drills and chests at (x=35.5, y=-86.5) and (x=35.5, y=-85.5)

### Iron/Copper Ore Processing at position(x=-28, y=-61)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill (x=-28.0, y=-61.0) with chest at (x=-27.5, y=-59.5)
- Stone furnace (x=-27.0, y=-58.0)
- Burner inserters at (x=-26.5, y=-59.5) and (x=-25.5, y=-58.5)
- Output chest at (x=-24.5, y=-58.5)
- Additional furnaces at (x=-23.0, y=-58.0), (x=-21.0, y=-58.0)

### Iron Mining Complex at position(x=-10 to -6, y=-59)
Consists of following entities:
- Three burner mining drills at (x=-10.0, y=-59.0), (x=-8.0, y=-59.0), (x=-6.0, y=-59.0)
- Output chests at (x=-9.5, y=-57.5), (x=-7.5, y=-57.5), (x=-5.5, y=-57.5)
- Connected by transport belts and burner inserters

### Smelting Line at position(x=0 to 6, y=0)
Consists of following entities:
- Four stone furnaces at (x=0.0, y=0.0), (x=2.0, y=0.0), (x=4.0, y=0.0), (x=6.0, y=0.0)
- Input/output inserters and chests system
- Connected by transport belts

### Power Generation System at position(x=4.5, y=20.5)
Consists of:
- Steam engine at (x=4.5, y=20.5)
- Boiler at (x=-1.5, y=22.0)
- Offshore pump at (x=-3.5, y=27.5)
- Connected by pipe network

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when extracting from containers
- Must be within reach distance of the target container before attempting to extract items
- Ensure the container has the requested items before attempting extraction

### Errors when inserting items
- Verify you have the items in your inventory before attempting to insert them
- Check if the target entity can accept the type of item you're trying to insert

### Entity placement errors
- Ensure target location is clear before placing entities
- Check if the chosen location has enough space for the entity's dimensions

### Resource management errors
- Keep track of chest capacity to prevent overflow
- Monitor fuel levels in burner entities to prevent work stoppage
- Empty full output chests to prevent production blockage
